content.name: Lint5's Triton (13th vers)
content.description:
[h1]This mod is currently not compatible with 6.0 due to the new physics engine[/h1]
[h1]Description:[/h1] Adds Triton Heavy Frigate (L-size) to Segaris Pioneers. Equipped with two large turret but poor health overall. Yes, the top turret is backward facing, this is done to prevent turret blocking the landing pad.
[b]VRO version is included in the base VRO mod[/b]
[h1]Ship Description:[/h1] As relations between the Protectorate and the Pioneers deteriorate, the Pioneers felt the need for a domestically designed and produced warship. As a result, the Segaris Development Program was initiated and Triton class was created as a prototype to test design ideas. Although it possesses a considerable amount of firepower for a ship of this size, the hull plating had to be thinned to create space for its power generation systems.
[h1]Credit:[/h1] [b]Japanese translation by Arkblade[/b] [b]French translation by StonedBread[/b] [b]Russian translation by aladinaleks[/b] [b]German translation by Luca[/b]
content.author: Lint5 (13th vers)

text.name: Lint5's Triton (13th vers)
text.description: Adds Triton heavy frigate to Segaris Pioneers
text.author: Lint5
